data.title: Great Irish Pub
data.text: A great place for a pint or two! Great service, great drinks and great atmosphere!Food is good and the patrons friendly. I recommend this pub!

data.title: Good food - horrible customer service!
data.text: Went to lunch and food was great, however, 2 people in our party of 7 received the wrong burgers. They discovered the error after each had taken a bite. Our server asked if they wanted new burgers with sides or just the burger, and we decided just the burgers. While we were waiting, the manager came to the the table and gave us Comedy tickets (I assume they have a comedy show on some nights during the evening) and apologized for the mix up with the burgers. When we got the bill they had added 2 extra burgers. When we pointed out the error, the server told us the manager had compensated us and we had to pay for both burgers we were served! Then, when we said the other burgers were sent back, she said she would have to pay for them. We said she shouldn't have to do that and she said, "they aren't making me but someone has to pay for them!". The burgers were taken off and we won't be returning to Dubh Linns again.

owner_response.author: Mike M, Owner at Dubh Linn Irish Brew Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I am so very sorry that you had a bad experience.  I am taken aback by how the staff on that day handled the situation.  You should have never been charged for two burgers, and we would never charge our server for a mix-up.  We work very hard to make sure that all customers have a great experience at the pub, and we will investigate this immediately.  Thank you for the insight.  Please contact me at Mikepmjr@yahoo.com, and I will make this up to your whole group.  
Thank you again, Mike.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Rude service, food mix up, expected to pay double!
data.text: Stopped for lunch with family as a group of seven. Had cocktails and lunch.  We all ordered sandwiches/burgers for lunch and the food came pretty quickly. The server called out the food as it was delivered and my sandwich was mixed up with my cousins boyfriends burger.  Both look similar but one was the olive burger and one was the jalapeño burger.  After one bite into our sandwiches we realized the server had mixed up or burgers.  We tracked down the server the who asked somewhat rudely if we wanted new sides or just new burgers.  She was clearly unhappy.  We said "oh no just the burgers are fine."   New burgers came and The manager stopped by with two free tickets to the comedy club for the mixup. When we received our bill both of our bills had two burgers each charged to them. When we asked the server to please remove them that we had accidentally been charged double she said, "I thought the manager had come over and explained that to you. She gave you two free comedy club tickets since we had to make you 2 burgers each."   We. Were. Shocked.  Apparently they felt because we wouldn't just switch the sandwiches, which we had both already bitten into, we needed to pay for the second burger even though the server took full responsibility for handing us the wrong ones.  When we asked again if that's for sure what she was saying, we needed to pay for 2 meals, she threw her hands up in the air and said " I will just pay for the second burgers. give me your bills and I'll remove them."  When I said to her well that's not fair you have to pay for it she said " well somebody's got to pay for it " and stomped off with our bills.  The second burgers were removed from our bills but we will never ever return to this establishment again.   I guess the empty restaurant should have been our first clue.

owner_response.author: Mike M, Owner at Dubh Linn Irish Brew Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I responded to the other person in your party, but I also wanted to reach out to you with the same message.  I am incredibly sorry about your experience, and taken aback that the staff handled this situation so poorly.  You should have never been charged for two burgers, and we would never make a server pay for a mixup.  We work hard to make sure all customers have a great experience, and we will investigate this immediately.  Please feel free to write me at Mikepmjr@yahoo.com so that I can make this up to your entire group.  Thank you for your insight, and once again, my apologies.
Mike
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food, service and beer!
data.text: We went for dinner, very good! I wanted the Reuben, our server P.J. Said yes! He was very timely and efficient!!All our meals were very good.... my Reuben with the garlic mashed potatoes was the best! Our beers and shots....tasty too! Cheers!

data.title: Good food! Good Beer!
data.text: We had the shepherd's pie and the piper's feast. Both excellent! Very good beer selection. Their microbrews are very good as well.

data.title: Good Craft Brews
data.text: I was in town on business. Met a friend for dinner and beer. The restaurant's atmosphere was everything I expected of an Irish Pub. We seated ourselves and service came right away to take our drink orders. The host was cordial and welcoming -- explained the evening's special. I had the shepherd's pie but was duly unimpressed. I've had better, fresher. But the beer was cold and that's all that counted. The rest of the evening was spent catching up. Great service but so-so food. Drink up.

data.title: Cozy atmosphere
data.text: We loved the atmosphere here! We were there when they had live music which was fantastic. We found the house made beer to be so-so. And my Old Fashioned drink wasn't mixed right-- but we're from Wisconsin, so tough critics. My fish and chips were a bit overpriced and over fried. My husband's bangers and mash was tasty, but very different take on the dish then we are use to. Overall, just ok.

data.title: Oh. My. Word.
data.text:
WOW!!!! We were BLOWN away!  Went there for the Irish food & were not disappointed. Had the corned beef & cabbage, piper's feast & Irish cream puff!

My son's quote "I don't want to hurt grandma's feelings, but......this is the BEST corned beef I've ever had!"  Sorry grandma 😂 

The piper's feast: I think a little part of me died & went to Heaven.  The beef melted in your mouth; carrots & parsnips had just the right crunch, the chunk of bread, crusty & dense.... *drools as writing*

data.title: Disappointed
data.text: Went for lunch during Tallships 2016 - disappointing service, food just marginal.  Probably will not go back.

data.title: Good food
data.text: They seated 11 of us quickly. Waitress was very attentive, and helpful with suggestions. As you can imagine it did take a while to get drinks and food for 11, especially since she had another table of about the same size, but she was always checking on us. Beer and wine was good and so was the food. Personally I would recommend the smoked trout.

data.title: Very good
data.text: Great service, friendly server, all 4 of us enjoyed our food.  We would definitely return.  The guys liked their Finn beer

data.title: Great food and Service
data.text: The food is excellent, try the Logan sandwich when you are there. It's amazing. The bar wait staff are excellent. They constantly were checking in on us to see if we needed anything. The food came very fast also.We Love the shuffleboard game in the game room.

data.title: A short walk from many hotels, neat place to eat/drink.
data.text:
Not wanting to have to drive anymore this day and feeling like adding a walk for the night I looked on Trip. for places nearby.  The reviews seemed good and I liked the menu options.  I may have made a better choice but settled on a burger that also came with cheese and cashews!  Not bad but not worth the extra few bucks for cashews if you ask me.  The fries were very good but later thought I should have gotten the mashed potatoes for a change.  
It has lots of seating from tables to booths and even a room for groups.  Sure it would be fun place to hang out when they have live music!

data.title: Spur of the moment stop!
data.text: What a great decision to stop at Dubh Linn Irish Pub! Sat at the bar, and were entertained by Ryan the bartender. We decided to enjoy some apps, and we were eating in just minutes! The apps were some of the best apps I've had, locally brewed tap beer, and awesome service! Definitely make this a stop if you live in Duluth or are just passing through!

data.title: Great burgers and potatoes
data.text: Had the Murphy burger with a couple pints.  Cheddar mashed potatoes were great. They have their own craft beer and other craft beers.  I had to try the Edmund Fitzgerald pints since its Duluth. Cool bar with good house music.

data.title: Great Irish Brew Pub!
data.text: Dubh Linn Irish Brew Pub is a great place to eat and/or grab a few beers right in downtown Duluth.  I recently tried the BBQ Cork Sandwich, and it was excellent. My wife enjoyed the Veggie Panini very much. There are many beer selections on tap, and the Pub also features several really good micro brews. The atmosphere here is very fun and the service was great. We will be back again!

data.title: Typical Irish Pub
data.text: Stopped in for drinks and appetizers.  Typical Irish fare on the menu.  It was midday and the waitress looked bored and was very slow.  I realize it is a bit off season, but everybody counts or nobody counts.  food was good, and their beer selection was great.

data.title: Nice Atmosphere
data.text: We stopped in for a happy hour beverage.  The waiter was very friendly.  There weren't very many people there but it was early.  The menu was a little pricey.

data.title: Surprisingly good food!
data.text: We swung in for beers and were so delighted by the friendly bartenders and staff, we stayed for dinner. We were expecting the same ol bar food—standard preprepared reheated  burgers, but were pleasantly surprised by freshly made burgers and fries. It was excellent. Friendly, fast service and a great selection of beers on tap. We'll be back!

data.title: Business Luncheon Spot On
data.text: Had the stuffed mushrooms.  Huge portabella mushroom with avocado slather made for a perfect luncheon meal.  Waiter was concerned that the menu said mushroom(s) indicating plural, but one was enough.  It was that large.  Next time I will try the burger with the slather.  A friend was eating that as I stopped by on the way out and it looked amazing.
